content: AIC 1000 Air cleaner Agile and light air cleaner for removing fine airborne particles during construction work ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Air cleaners- - - ### FEATURES:Features Safer workplaces – further reduce your team’s exposure to airborne dust: air scrubbers complement tool-based dust removal systems when creating virtually dust-free jobsites Less time spent cleaning up – air cleaners scrub fine dust from the air before it can accumulate, reducing the amount left to clean up at the end of the day Dust confinement – helps to prevent dust from spreading beyond your work area and into sensitive zones, such as hospitals Versatile and practical design – can easily be integrated into dust walls, and no accessories are needed to attach hoses Ultimate transportability – a weight of just 33 lbs, large wheels and a telescopic handle make this one of the most mobile air cleaners available Applications Removing airborne dust produced during construction work, such as grinding, finishing, demolition and cutting Creating negative pressure areas which help to contain dust within a specified confinement zone Suitable for fine dust particles, such as from hazardous building materials which take a long time to settle (including silica dust) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 33.51 lb.
